info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Clear Gloss Lacquer B‑1250 is a nitrocellulose, solvent-based, high-gloss lacquer varnish finish that dries to a hard durable film. BOYSEN®® Clear Dead Flat Lacquer B‑1253 is a nitrocellulose, solvent-based, flat lacquer varnish finish that dries to a hard, durable film. Its high-build properties make an ideal choice for furniture, fixtures, and other woodworks. BOYSEN®® Water White Clear Gloss Lacquer B‑1258 is a high grade, durable, clear gloss lacquer finish that enhances the natural grain of interior woodworks.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Products are ideal for interior sealed wood such as furniture, store fixtures, cabinets, doors, and panels.

info.title: SERVICE CONDITIONS
info.body: If necessary, add approximately 10% by volume of BOYSEN®® Lacquer Flo B‑1205 to the ready-to-use mixture.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Sand surface until wood is smooth to the touch. Hammer all nails deep enough to apply wood filler. Dust off surfaces completely then wipe with a clean rag. If repainting, remove all paint using manual or mechanical methods prior to application of BOYSEN®® lacquer products.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.body: Stain: BOYSEN®® Oil Wood Stain (optional) Sealer Coat: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Sanding Sealer B‑1254, sanded lightly before topcoat application Final coat: BOYSEN®® Clear Gloss Lacquer B‑1250, BOYSEN®® Clear Dead Flat Lacquer B‑1253 or BOYSEN®® Water White Clear Gloss Lacquer B‑1258
